module » dkernel

wrs.js File Reference

Detailed Description

This equips the platform remote scripting.

'Remote Scripting' is the technique that machine A remotely fetches and uses script files on machine B. This module empowers the Wednus platform to be able to load extension packs remotely.

Note:
supports IE5+
Author:
Sundew H. Shin
